snippet: Makerbot, a Brooklyn-based start-up that builds 3-D printers, announced its latest offering on Tuesday. The MakerBot Replicator can make larger objects than the company’s previous 3-D printers.
abstract: Makerbot, a Brooklyn-based start-up that builds 3-D printers, announced its latest offering on Tuesday. The MakerBot Replicator can make larger objects than the company’s previous 3-D printers.
